content:
"""
Let's break this down into smaller steps and ensure we have all resources before proceeding.
We'll check inventory at each step.
"""

# First, let's check our current inventory
print(f"Starting inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Collect coal first since we're out
coal_pos = nearest(Resource.Coal)
assert coal_pos, "No coal found"
move_to(coal_pos)
coal_collected = harvest_resource(coal_pos, quantity=50)
print(f"After collecting coal, inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Move back to furnaces and refuel them
move_to(Position(x=0, y=0))
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace1, quantity=10)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace2, quantity=10)

# Get more iron ore
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_pos)
iron_collected = harvest_resource(iron_pos, quantity=50)
print(f"After collecting iron ore, inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Move back to furnaces and add iron ore
move_to(Position(x=0, y=0))
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace1, quantity=10)
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace2, quantity=10)

# Wait for smelting
sleep(10)
print(f"Entities status after smelting: {get_entities()}")

# Extract iron plates
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace1.position)
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace2.position)
print(f"After extracting plates, inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Now try crafting with our new materials
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=5)
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerInserter, quantity=2)
print(f"After crafting, inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Now we should be ready to set up the mining drill
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_pos)
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, position=iron_pos)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=10)

print(f"Final setup complete. Entities: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Final inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
